0.title: vctx - Hardware for Humans
0.text:
vctx
    

    Experimental HDL

    
      A structural hardware description language for hobbyists. Explicit timing, strictly typed, and designed for fun.
    
    
    
      
        
          
        
        
          Type Checking
          Strict typing for registers, wires, and widths
        
      

      
        
          
        
        
          LSP Server
          VS Code Language Extension is available
        
      

      
        
          
        
        
          Verification First
          Integrated `sim` and `formal` blocks for cycle-accurate testing.
        
      

      
        
          
        
        
          Incremental Compilation
            Built on CIRCT and MLIR
        
      
    

    
      
        vctx-cli --help
        
          
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
        Get Started
      
      
        
        GitHub
      
    
  
  
  
    
      
        
          
          
          
        
        blinky.vctx
